## Problem 1
```{r}
set.seed(1234)
```   


```{r}
n <- 5
lambda <- 8

X <- dgamma(1:10000, shape=lambda, scale=n)
```


Calculating our sum of exponential distributions: `Y` and `Z`:
```{r}
Y <- 0
for (i in 1:n){
  Y <- Y + dexp(1:10000, rate=lambda)
}

Z <- dexp(1:10000, rate=lambda)
```


#### Expected value and variance of our PDFs
```{r}
print(mean(X))
print(mean(Y))
print(mean(Z))
```

```{r}
print(var(X))
print(var(Y))
print(var(Z))
```
